original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Manasseh, and his prayer unto his God, and the words of the seers that spake to him in the name of the Lord God of Israel, behold, they are written in the book of the kings of Israel.
korean_text: 므낫세의 남은 사적과 그가 하나님께 한 기도와 선견자가 이스라엘 하나님 여호와의 이름으로 권한 말씀은 모두 이스라엘 왕들의 행장에 기록되었고

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the acts of Manasseh
and his prayer unto his God
and the words of the seers
in the name of the Lord God of Israel
in the book of the kings of Israel
